EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear OrderManagement Team,
Please find the Customer Setup Form generated from Salesforce to register in SAP application against the Customer - {!Account.Name}.

Sales & CI Team
Region - {!Account.Region__c}
NOTE: This is a system generated message. Please do not reply this email.
